item.description:
Checkout Johnny A at Scullers
400 Soldiers Field Road
Allston, MA 02134
617-562-4111

Scullers

Johnny A. is widely regarded as one of America's finest contemporary guitarists. Gibson thinks so â€“ their Custom Shop designed a Signature Edition guitar per his specific requests.
When it was marketed in 2003 this placed him in an exclusive club that included legends like BB King, Wes Montgomery, Chet Atkins, Joe Perry, Pat Martino and Les Paul himself. The public thinks so too - Johnny A.'s latest works have sold thousands of copies.

The most recent CD's - 2004's Get Inside and 1999's Sometime Tuesday Morning, are the critically acclaimed solo culmination of a lifetime of learning, sharing and bonding in a long parade of bands and players.

Listen to Johhny A (Hipbone fragment)

Listen to Johhny A

Let's meetup and Checkout Johnny A

Tickets are $25 for the show $70 dinner and show
Two shows are now listed 8pm or 10pm.
I'm thinking the 8pm show! Please list your preference and we should probably get tickets soon.
Say by Nov 25th or so at the latest if you too want the early show...
item.how_to_find_us: I can furnish cell phone to any member that signs up.
item.name: Johnny A @ Scullers
